mode.describe: Specify if you want just to create the version, only publish a previous version, or both

publish-branches.describe: branches in which it should publish

wildcard-minor.describe: wildcard to identify a minor commit

wildcard-major.describe: wildcard to identify a major commit

wildcard-beta.describe: wildcard to identify a beta commit

wildcard-no-publish.describe: wildcard to identify a commit to skip publish

registry.describe: npm registry to force the publish. npm publish --registry=VALUE

git-email.describe: git email to create the commit

git-name.describe: git name to create the commit

commit-message.describe: commit message. Use %v to specify the version and %p to specify the package

tag-name.describe: commit message. Use %v to specify the version and %p to specify the package
